body.description: The Corsair Flash Survivor stealth black USB 3.0 flash drive with 128GB capacity, is perfect to store important files and is capable of transferring files at high speed. Featuring an anodized, aircraft-grade aluminum housing, this flash drive is waterproof to 200 m, resists vibration as well as shock. It is backward compatible with USB 2.0. This USB drive features USB standard-A connector that works with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports. It is suitable for use with Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X and Linux operating systems.- 128GB flash drive is perfect for backing up and transferring valuable digital photos, music, documents.- Dimensions: 3"H x 0.9"W x 0.9"D.- Encased in extremely strong CNC-milled, anodized aircraft-grade aluminum, water proof to 200m through the use of a EPDM waterproof seal.- Compatible with Mac, PC.- Connectivity: USB 3.0.- Form factor: External.- Comes in black color.- Operating system: Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows Me, Mac OS X v9.x and above, Linux Kernel 2.4.2 and higher.- Plug-and-play compatible.- USB standard-A connector works with both USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports.- Shock: 40 G.- Weight: 0.08 lbs.The Corsair Flash Survivor Stealth CMFSS3B-128GB external USB flash drive in black, has a storage capacity of 128GB. This plug and play drive features extremely strong CNC-milled and anodized aircraft-grade aluminum housing. This drive is vibration-resistant, shock-resistant and water proof to 200 m with EPDM waterproof seal. The USB standard-A connector works with both USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports. This drive works well with Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows Me, Mac OS X v9.x and above, Linux Kernel 2.4.2 and higher operating systems.- Sold as 1 Each.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 1,361 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Military-style data transport with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 compatibility Your files are important — that's why you're taking them with you. Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0 flash drives help keep them safe. The anodized, aircraft-grade aluminum housing is waterproof to 200 meters, vibration-resistant, and shock-resistant.

USB 3.0 speed with High-performance USB 2.0 support If you move a lot of data, you've noticed that as convenient as USB flash drives are, they never seem to be as fast as you'd like. USB 3.0 changes the game. Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0 offers read speeds up to four times faster than traditional USB 2.0 drives. It's fast enough to view most videos directly from your Flash Survivor Stealth, without having to take the usual extra step of copying it to a hard drive first. Not only is Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0 backward compatible with USB 2.0 — it offers great performance, too. No matter how up-to-date your PC is, you'll be able to quickly take care of moving your files and be off on your next adventure. Universal compatibility It works with Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, and even Linux without drivers, and there's no software to install. Just plug it in, and go. If your computer has a USB 2.0 or 3.0 connector, you can use Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0. Proven reliability With over two decades of building enthusiast-grade memory and components, we've earned a reputation for quality, compatibility, and performance. Need help? We're available by phone call, email or web forum. Note: Some of the listed capacity on a Flash storage device is used for formatting and other functions and thus is not available for data storage. The actual available capacity for data storage is less than what is listed on the product. Features Encased in extremely strong CNC-milled, anodized aircraft-grade aluminum Water proof to 200M through the use of a EPDM waterproof seal Protected from vibration or impact damage through the use of a molded shock damping collar High Performance with USB 3.0 or USB 2.0 Plug-n-Play compatible Protected by a limited 5-year warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely the best USB drive I've bought. It's waterproof and built like a tank. If you need a drive to keep sensitive info or vital data on, this is it. It's USB 3.0 so it loads/uploads fast. Yeah, it's a little pricy but well worth it. I highly recommend this drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent USB stick!
reviews.reviewText: I’m enjoying this line of USB sticks from Corsair as I have different sizes, basically increasing as my portable storage needs increase. This model is no different in that the build it’s sealed where you could submerse this and not worry about it getting exposed to the water. I’ve seen online tests where people have buried it and froze it and it’s come back usable every time. The only thing I haven’t tried is literal trial by fire and trying to see if it would survive one. While they’ve shown tests of it being run over by a car, I haven’t done that but I have accidentally dropped about 40 lbs on it and no physical damage to the casing and the stick itself still works great.As far as transfer rates, unless you’re counting seconds or even milliseconds, it’s relatively fast under USB 2.0 and on a 3.0 port extremely fast. If you’re looking for something with a lot of portable storage space and is durable at the same time, this is worth considering. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most rugged thumb drive on the market
reviews.reviewText: I've had one of these for about 3 years now, and really needed another one. I have one with work stuff on, and one with personal stuff on. I have literally run over one of these with my truck for work, and there was absolutely no damage at all. The only thing I did find out is that if you put two on one key ring, it is a little tricky. I did find a solution, and that's with a wire key ring, the type that you screw into each other. These are USB 3.0, so they are super fast. These are the real deal, and not knockoffs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flash Drive Protection
reviews.reviewText: Production arrived quickly. 128 GB flash drive. Works well transferring data between home & office computers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great USB, the only problem I have with it is if you barley tap it, it moves out of position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As a dj I love this usb
reviews.reviewText: I have this usb for 2 years now . I need it for my dj gigs . One time I had to play on really old decks and all my other USB’s failed to load music 😫 except for the survivor😻 Knowing that its compatible with old and new decks and different software I highly recommend it ! For djs !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Im happy and ready for use on CDJ-3000 Pioneer, 🔥 🙌🤗🎧

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These things aren't speedy compared to other drives I have used, But they last years and put up with lots of abuse. Words like sturdy and durable are an understatement. Indestructible and invincible are more accurate.

Realmente um pen drive para aplicações profissionais,Resistente, seguro, com uma cápsula metálica que o fará resistir as piores intempéries que você consiga imaginar.O preço é elevadíssimo, a entrega é proporcional.
In a dirty environment with CNC equipment, so it’s nice for durability and staying clean

reviews.reviewTitle: Besten USB Stick, den ich kenne
reviews.reviewText: Besten USB Stick, den ich kenne sieht top aus. Macht was es soll für Leute wie viel unterwegs sind und ihre Daten sicher transportieren wollen. Ein Muss zum Beispiel für DJs und Fotografen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First off, this is not a cheap drive. For the capacity, if you just need something for transfers or something there are a lot of other options.But this isn't aimed at that really. For me, its good to know that I can chuck this in a bag and generally be careless with it and it'll basically be impossible to damage or kill.The waterproof seal seems great, and the solid metal construction seems a lot stronger than any other drives I have. Its great to have at least one drive that you can trust to not die on you.I use this as my boot/installation drive, and for backing up important docs that I definitely don't want to lose, and its great.
